---
category: news
title: "Cornell researchers invent earphones that track facial expressions even with face mask"
excerpt: "Researchers at Cornell University have invented an earphone that can continuously track full facial expressions, even when the face is covered by a mask. The ear-mounted device, named C-Face, works by observing the contour of the cheeks and then translates the expressions into emojis or speech commands."
